description: Our collection of two storey house designs covers everything from traditional British styles to country cottages and stunning contemporary homes. Classic two storey house designs have been a fixture in our nation's house building since the Victorian terraced houses of the early 1900s. Much has changed since then of course, but for many a self-builder, the notion of building their own home includes the provision of plenty of living and bedroom space. Our two storey homes vary quite notably in size and shape, but they all have our signature high quality design in common. Whether you prefer the rustic, rural, traditional look or the glass, wood and steel of a contemporary design, you're sure to find something to inspire you.
name: Houses (Two Storey+)
